channel.title: CVE Feed for HelloAsso -- HelloAsso
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HelloAsso -- HelloAsso

item.title: CVE-2024-7605|2024-09-05T11:00:13.521Z -- helloasso -- helloasso
item.description: The HelloAsso plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'ha_ajax' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.10. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to update plugin options, potentially disrupting the service.

item.title: CVE-2024-32697|2024-08-02T02:20:34.514Z -- helloasso -- helloasso
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HelloAsso allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HelloAsso: from n/a through 1.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-37488|2024-07-21T07:30:40.205Z -- helloasso -- helloasso
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HelloAsso allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HelloAsso: from n/a through 1.1.9.
